## As a <role>, I want <capability> so that <benefit>.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] AC 1
- [ ] AC 2
- [ ] AC 3

## Notes
- UX references / links
- Data model impacts

## Out of Scope

## Definition of Done
- AC validated, PR merged, CI green, QA sign-off
